name: Ext_R5_MedicationDispense_dosageInstruction
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationDispense.dosageInstruction for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationDispense.dosageInstruction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: How the medication is to be used by the patient or administered by the caregiver
element.definition: Indicates how the medication is to be used by the patient.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.dosageInstruction` maps to R4B `MedicationDispense.dosageInstruction`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
